page.title: 13Law and Order
page.content: Our area is covered by a Home Beat Officer.He works an 8 hour day and patrols on a three year old bicycle.His beat includes fields,a golf course and housing estates.He has been in the Police Force for 28 years. He carries a truncheon,a whistle,hand-cuffs and a radio.He deals mainly with domestic disputes,burgularies and children's offences.The most common crime in this area is burgulary.There were 27 people banned from driving because they were drunk.The worst road for traffic accidents is Wingletye Lane.There have been no murders in our area.
